revision.text:
{{Wiktionary|Bihar|bihar}}
'''[[Bihar]]''' is a state in India.
'''Bihar''' may also refer to :
; Places in [[India]]: * [[Bihar Province]], former colonial province in British India * [[Bihar Subah]], a Bihar-based Mughal imperial province * [[Bihar Sharif]], headquarters of Nalanda district, Bihar, India * [[Bihar River]], a border river of [[Palamu district]], Jharkhand, India ; elsewhere : * [[Bihar County]], a historic county of the Kingdom of Hungary * [[Bihor County]] (''Bihar'' County in Hungarian), a county of current-day Romania * ''Bihar'', the Hungarian name for [[Biharia]] Commune, Bihor County, Romania
; Persons : * [[Bihar (king)]], a khagan of the Khazars * [[Bihar (surname)]], a surname
== See also == * [[Hajd√∫-Bihar]], a county in Hungary * [[Koch Bihar]], a princely state in Northeast India * [[Bihar al-Anwar]], a hadith compilation by Allamah Majlisi * [[Behar (parsha)|Behar]], a portion in the annual Jewish cycle of Torah reading
{{Disambiguation|geo}}
